page.title: 01Overview
page.content: This sector consists of two large corporation housing estates separated by a country park and villages whose history goes back to Viking times. {Croxteth}lies within the Liverpool City boundary and was built in the 50's. {Cantril Farm}was built in the 70's, extending an existing develop- ment but straddling the border into Knowsley District, who have renamed their section{Stockbridge Village}and started an extensive face-lift. { Croxteth Hall}is in a Country Park stretching from{West Derby}(already a thriving community at the time of the Norman Conquest) to{Knowsley Village (after which the Metropolitan District was named when{Huyton}and{Kirkby}were joined) and nestling into it is the {Brookside}estate of the Channel 4 Soap Opera. {Knowsley Hall}and{Knowsley {Safari Park}adjoin the village.
